title.rendered: Cosmopolitan Luxe Bench Seating – deep button backrest – price per metre

content.rendered:
Our refined Cosmopolitan Luxe features all of the exceptional quality of the Cosmopolitan and adds the extra refinement of a deep buttoned back. Fashioned from Russian red wood and combined with our sumptuous range of in-house faux leathers, the Luxe is an elegant addition to the Cosmopolitan range for those looking for a more striking visual style.

Prices per metre (includes standard Seren+ fabrics and wood finishes shown – call for C.O.M or bespoke sizes)

HANDMADE IN THE U.K.
